But we did our best without forgetting our own style.
It was a lot of fun. I had a lot of fun while recording.
And Morning Musume。 23 will start Morning Musume。 23 Concert Tour Autumn NEVER ENDING SHINE SHOW will start on September 16.
This tour is the first tour for the 17th term members,
And for Sei Fukumura, it is her last tour,
This tour is a combination of the first and the last,
I hope we can work hard and make lots of memories until the end of the tour.
Ochanomaha will start its live tour 2023 "Our hometown is Japan" on October 7.
This will be Ochanoma's first live house tour in all 47 prefectures of Japan,
We are all very enthusiastic and will do our best.

Morning Musume。' 23 will start their fall tour this weekend on September 16.
This is the first tour for the 17th term members and the last tour for Sei Fukumura,

I would like to do my best until the end of the tour.
The autumn tour will start on October 7.

We are looking forward to seeing you. I am sure that there will be many people who don't know Morning Musume。
I will also perform at the trainee presentation on September 17 and 18 at Ocha-no-Ma.
And on November 19, we will hold the Ochanoma community revitalization concert in Bizen City, Okayama Prefecture.
This will be the first time for Miku Nishizaki to perform at many events and pass tours in her hometown, Okayama Prefecture, so please come and visit us!
